name: STRINGS (GvYoutube)
description:
Welcome to STRINGS The goal of this game is to shoot (aim with the mouse and click to shoot) through all the strings there are with one shot. 

The red spikes destroy the ball and so does the edge of the level. 

By pressing any key on the keyboard you pause the game and can get back to the start page the level select page and you can change the settings.

NOTE: Windows version need Windows 10 or 11 64 bit. MAC version needs to have a Apple Silicon Mac, or an Intel Silicon Mac.

Please look at the read me document in your zip for your OS.

Press S to see where the aim is, press a for where the ball`s path will go.
